summary: Implements a GPU‑accelerated SpecAugment operation that randomly masks contiguous frequency and time blocks in spectrogram tensors, applying the augmentation in‑place via a Numba CUDA kernel for high‑throughput parallel processing across batch, frequency, and time dimensions.
business_intent: Speed up speech‑recognition training pipelines by providing fast, scalable data augmentation, enhancing model robustness while reducing CPU load and training time.
